solution.text:
Area of Polygon = Area of Trapezium (1) + Area of Trapezium (2)
= Area of Trapezium \(\times 2\)
\(= \frac 12 (a+c)(h) \times 2\)
\(= \frac 12 (_{{3*j*Decimal('0.5')}}_ + _{{2*j}}_)(_{j}_) \times 2\)
\(= _{{Decimal('0.5')*((3*j*Decimal('0.5'))+(2*j))*j*2}}_ mm^2\)

content.text: In the polygon below, a=_{{3*j*Decimal('0.5')}}_ mm, h=_{j}_ mm, c=_{{2*j}}_ mm
